Row.Text: Lijia (Faith)
Lijia (Faith)
Project which provides [ICON_Faith] Faith every turn equal to 50% of this city's production.
Lijia (Food)
Lijia (Food)
Project which provides [ICON_Food] Food every turn equal to 50% of this city's production.
Lijia (Gold)
Lijia (Gold)
Project which provides [ICON_Gold] Gold every turn equal to 100% of this city's production.
Yinding
Likes Civilizations with positive income per turn, dislikes civilizations with negative income per turn.
They are pleased with your positive income
Is saddened by your negative income
I am the Yongle Emperor, friend to those who would steer their trade ships in my direction, and terrible to those who oppose me.
You may as well seek to conquer heaven itself. Let us see how high your arrows fly.
Conquest by arms was never my aim, but we arrive at a point now where there is no alternative.
We only deal with those who have something to offer. Like you, for instance.
We must seek wealth, from the ox-driver to the king.
The road before me is dark, and black are the surrounding pines. Above I cannot see the heavens, and below I cannot see the earth.
May you learn from our example.
A friend is an equal. You are not.
We are building a coalition of like-minded people. Shall you take part?
Let both benefit
We cannot accept such a thing
We have tried our best to educate your people on the merits of good governance, of propriety and tact. I am not sure we succeeded.
We already have some of those.
Silk and porcelain, tea and cloth - the lifeblood of the Chinese empire.
The barking of dogs.
I have told you again and again to refrain from evil. Soon I will tire of the telling.
Come and see the Hall of Supreme Harmony, and let your thoughts be stilled.
Heaven is for it.
We seek knowledge of the world. You are drawn towards the world's center.
I have been summoned - what is it?
To be one with Ming, one with China - what could be greater?
When there is peace in the land, there will be peace in the heavens.
You continue to resist the will of the center of all things.
War only makes widows. Surely there are more profitable pasttimes.
The world is open, let us wander it.
You require our permission to enter, and we do not give it.
We have trade fleets and merchant caravans that seek access to your lands.
We know well how to handle barbarian hordes on our frontier.
I stood from my throne to listen to this?
Trade is not so difficult when all agree.
(You have a positive income per turn.)
(You have a negative income per turn.)
Shendu
Court Intrigue
Likes civilizations who pose no threat. Dislikes civilizations with strong militaries or ones with nearby cities.
I am Wu Zetian, the most feared and loved Empress in China. The only Empress in China.
Here come a bunch of men waving swords around and shouting. Or am I supposed to call this mess an "art?"
My dear, the time has come for you to go.
You've been such a comfort to me. As loyal as my eunuchs.
You think I am here to be plotted against? I am the one that plots!
Please... I'm sure we could work something out. This doesn't have to be the end... does it?
Wonderful. I shall treat you as though you are my own child.
I have plenty of admirers, I'm afraid.
I would like to get to know you better.
Friends are how we climb the ladder of our ambition.
I gain nothing from associating with you.
Nearly all of your delegation have returned intact!
Oh... This would have been interesting in the Han Dynasty. Now it's out of date, I'm afraid.
I send to you horses carved in jade, dancers from all the regions of China, and, as always the best silks our looms produce.
Your words are sharp. Other things are sharper.
I have a long list of enemies. You are on that list. (Denounces You)
Our capital has layers of history, art settled down into the very dust. Shall you see it?
Of course.
All roads lead here, to the Zhou Empire.
Please sit. Have some tea. No, not that cup. This one I have made just for you.
Keep your friends close, and keep your --- I mean. Let us keep our friends close.
Death is so much more pleasant without all the shouting.
Shall you stop my rise upon the world's stage? I think not.
This war has ceased to inspire.
We have nothing to hide.
No. The forbidden has an aspect of mystery, does it not?
Let us measure the extent of both of our lands, that we might better know each other.
Your presence here isâ€¦ unsubtle.
You have more you can give.
I know a good deal when I see one.
Sihai
Wants all the Barbarians following his side. Does not like civilizations that destroy Barbarian Outposts.
This unit can use an action to convert adjacent Barbarians to your side, but it removes this unit. (Qin (Unifier))
Is disappointed you are clearing Barbarian Outposts
They are pleased to see you not clearing Barbarian Outposts

{LOC_DIPLO_DENOUNCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_VISIT_RECIPIENT_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NEAR_INITIATOR_POSITIVE_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_FIRST_MEET_NO_MANS_INFO_EXCHANGE_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_GREETING_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
Just as we cultivate the land before it bears fruit, so we cultivate the lesser peoples so that they might join with us.
Is that all you are, a killer of the wild folk?
{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_ALLIANCE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_ACCEPT_DEAL_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_AI_REFUSE_DEAL_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_MAKE_PEACE_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}

{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_HUMAN_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_OPEN_BORDERS_FROM_AI_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_WARNING_TOO_MANY_TROOPS_NEAR_ME_LEADER_QIN_ANY}
